questions.quote: Of course I'm all right. I'm here with my girl, Nina. And what better way to pass the time than gabbing with my best friend -- with whom there are no secrets.  Like this. Since the fourth grade.
Moving cars from one side of the street to the other don't take no more sense than putting on a pair of pants. My question to you is who's putting your pants on?
Jerry, a throat-clear is a non-verbal implication of doubt - he thinks I killed Susan!
Hey, so get this. I get a call this morning from one of the Mets front office guys. They wanna take me out to lunch.
Jerry, your grandmother gave you this gift. She wants you to spend the money, to have the fun that she can't have. Oh, this is tantamount to a slap in the face.
I told them I was just about to see you.. It's a Festivus miracle!
" That guy was amazing, he could dunk and he was my height...What was his name again?"
Oh, I love full lips. Something you can really put the lipstick on.
Just when I was doing great. I told you God wouldn't let me be successful.
He just walked away! And once again I'm standing here like a little man. Well not this time!  You! Dog man!
